instructions: Open iTunes and connect the iPhone over USB. After a few moments, your device should be recognized in iTunes. Select the iPhone on the left pane of iTunes, under Devices , to see a summary screen that details information like backup settings and options. If you don't see this screen, select the small phone icon at the top of iTunes, right below the menu. Scroll down the summary screen until you see the Options section. Click the checkbox next to Manually manage music and videos to enable it. Click the Apply button to save the settings and switch to this manual mode.
